alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Franklin; Granville; Harnett; Johnston; Sampson; Vance; Wake; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 1:55PM EDT until July 09 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Vance County in central North Carolina... Western Warren County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Sampson County in central North Carolina... Harnett County in central North Carolina... Eastern Granville County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Cumberland County in central North Carolina... Wake County in central North Carolina... Johnston County in central North Carolina... Franklin County in central North Carolina... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 154 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from the Virginia border to near Wake Forest to near Angier to 7 miles northeast of Pope AFB, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Henderson, Smithfield, Oxford, Louisburg, Lillington, Warrenton, Wake Forest and Garner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Franklin; Granville; Harnett; Johnston; Sampson; Vance; Wake; Warren
